title: Stack Gallery
shortDescription: Display your photos scattered on screen.
longDescription:
**About** If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help. Sometimes times you just want to peek over a group of items to understand how they fit together. By using this creative approach we built the Stack Gallery. It surprises and engages users with it's unique interactions, by scattering your content on the canvas. This is ideal when you want to save space, while presenting more items at once. For example on mobile devices.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support. * Add up to 3 items.
author: Widgetic

products.title: Premium
products.shortDescription: Removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Unlimited Items** - _add more than 3 images_
- **Image Rotation** - _specify the values between which the images will rotate_
- **Scatter Area** - _specify the distance between the images_
- **Photo Opacity** - _set the image transparency_

products.title: Basic
products.longDescription:
**Standard Features**

* Use an existing layout or create a new one.
* Top customer support.
* Add up to 3 items.

proposedApp.title: Stack Gallery
proposedApp.shortDescription: Display your photos scattered on screen.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**About** If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help. Sometimes times you just want to peek over a group of items to understand how they fit together. By using this creative approach we built the Stack Gallery. It surprises and engages users with it's unique interactions, by scattering your content on the canvas. This is ideal when you want to save space, while presenting more items at once. For example on mobile devices.
**Standard Features** * Use one of our preset layout styles or create your own. * Customize the style to fit the look and feel of your website. * Responsive, works on mobile, tablet and desktop. * Top customer support. * Add up to 3 items.
proposedApp.author: Widgetic

products.title: Slack Gallery
products.shortDescription: Display your photos scattered on screen.
products.longDescription:
**If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help.** Sometimes times you just want to peek over a group of items to understand how they fit together. By using this creative approach we built the Stack Gallery. It surprises and engages users with it's unique interactions, by scattering your content on the canvas. This is ideal when you want to save space, while presenting more items at once. For example on mobile devices.
**Standard Features** * Use one of our preset layout styles or create your own. * Customize the style to fit the look and feel of your website. * Responsive, works on mobile, tablet and desktop. * Top customer support. * Add up to 3 items.
**Premium Features** **All Standard Features** - Start building apps with your own design and content. **Remove Branding** - Remove the Widgetic branding from the bottom right corner. **Unlimited Items** - Add more than 3 images. **Adjust Images** - Customize the image rotation, opacity and scatter area.
